# allPresses

**Instance Property**

The state of all physical buttons in the event.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allPresses: Set<UIPress> { get }
```

## Return Value

The set of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress] instances that participated in this event.

## Reading the event button presses

- **presses(for:)**: Returns the state of all physical buttons in the event that are associated with a particular gesture recognizer.
